name: Love Games & Love Signs
description:
Love Games & Love Signs is a romantic visual novel where you, the player, get the opportunity your little gay heart always desired. You not only join the school's tabletop RPG club, but you're going to get a chance to date the members. Surprise, they're all gay.

There are four datable characters and a growing amount of content to this new VN over time. It's still quite a work in progress, but I have a fair amount more content written than is currently translated into game.
